name: 陳柏全
objective: This course offers opportunities for students to develop their oral presentation skills in both Chinese and English via simulated presentations in class. Students will learn to present their papers precisely and engage in conversation properly. Prompt engineering for generative AI will also be introduced as a tool to help improve writing and presenting in English.
